source.query: select max(updated_at) as max_updated_date  from recipe;

SELECT 
    au.id,
    COALESCE(sket_en.name, '') AS name_en,
    COALESCE(sket_en.recipe, '') AS recipe_en,
    au.calories,
    au.cuisine_id,
    CASE WHEN regexp_replace(au.servings, '\D*(\d+).*', '\1') <> '' 
         THEN CAST(regexp_replace(au.servings, '\D*(\d+).*', '\1') AS INTEGER)
         ELSE 0 
    END AS servings,
    au.updated_at,
    au.visible AS is_visible,
    au.created_at,
    COALESCE(sket_en.description, '') AS description_en,
    COALESCE(sket_ar.name, '') AS name_ar,
    COALESCE(sket_ar.recipe, '') AS recipe_ar,
    COALESCE(sket_ar.description, '') AS description_ar,
    1 AS country_id,
    '' AS cuisines_banner_image_url,
    '' AS recipe_banner_image_url,
    '' AS app_home_image_url,
    0 AS position
FROM 
    spree_kitchen_recipes au
LEFT JOIN 
    spree_kitchen_recipe_translations sket_en ON (sket_en.spree_kitchen_recipe_id = au.id AND sket_en.locale = 'en')
LEFT JOIN 
    spree_kitchen_recipe_translations sket_ar ON (sket_ar.spree_kitchen_recipe_id = au.id AND sket_ar.locale = 'ar')
where au.updated_at > '@{variables('max_updated_date')}';
